game-select-title: What Game Would You Like To Play?
game-select-subtitle: Designed to test across a battery of cognitive abilities for functional independence and general wellbeing

end-sess.end-alert: By clicking “Confirm”, you will exit this session and go back to Home Page. But be assured that all the play data will be saved.

understand:
Are you ready to play?
Let's try it!

TagMeQuick.name: Quick
TagMeQuick.ins: In this game, tag the moles as fast as you can. The more moles you tag, the better your score! Try it out!

TagMeOnly.name: Only
TagMeOnly.ins: Tag the moles without hats or glasses as fast as you can. Be careful, if you tag the moles wearing hats and glasses, you will lose points. Try it out!

TagMeSwitch.name: Switch
TagMeSwitch.ins:
In this game, three moles will pop up at the same time, but only one of them is the correct one.

Try out different rules until you find the correct rule!

When lightning strikes, the rule will change. Then you’ll need to find the new rule. Try it out!
TagMeSwitch.colour: The correct mole could be a specific colour:
TagMeSwitch.place: Or the correct mole could be at a specific place:

TagMeAgainEasy.name: Again Easy
TagMeAgainEasy.ins:
Moles Appear One at a Time, Remember the Number!

Do you remember the mole’s number??

If you remembered “1”, you are correct!

Tag the New Mole if it Matches the One Before

Don’t Tag the New Mole if it Doesn’t Match the One Before!

The One Before wore a 2 so you do tag!

TagMeAgainMedium.name: Again Medium
TagMeAgainMedium.ins:
In Easy you tagged a mole if it matched the One Before!

In Medium you need to remember numbers from Two Before!

Tag the New Mole if it Matches the mole Two Before!

Again, Tag the New Mole if it Matches the mole Two Before!

TagMeAgainHard.name: Again Hard
TagMeAgainHard.ins:
In Hard you need to remember numbers from Three Before!

Tag the New Mole if it Matches the mole Three Before!

Again, Tag the New Mole if it Matches the mole Three Before!

TagMeWhere.name: Where
TagMeWhere.ins: In this game, you will see a lighting bolt followed by a mole. Most of the time, a mole pops up in the same hole as the lightning bolt appears, but sometimes a mole pops up in different holes randomly.  Try to tag all the moles as fast as you can.

TagMeSame.name: Same
TagMeSame.ins: Help the mama mole find her baby. You will first see a sparkly mama mole and then two babies. Quickly tag the baby mole who has the same colour as the mama mole. Try it out!

TagMeBigger.name: Bigger
TagMeBigger.ins: In this game, you will see two moles, one wearing a big number, and one wearing a small number. Always tag the mole who’s wearing the bigger number, even if he’s shorter. Go as quickly as you can. Try it out!

1b.title: Yikes!
1b.text: Only tag moles with the same number as ONE before!

2b.title: Yikes!
2b.text: Only tag moles with the same number as TWO before!

3b.title: Yikes!
3b.text: Only tag moles with the same number as THREE before!

correct.title: Yikes!
correct.text: Only tag moles with the same number as the mole before!

bigger.title: Try Again!
bigger.text: Remember, tag the mole wearing a bigger number!

color.title: Oops!
color.text: Remember to tag the baby mole that is the same colour as its sparkly mom!
